item.Name: push to spawn enabled#allow loadout menu to delay spawn

_field_short_integer.name: loadout menu spawn suppression time#maximal time that the loadout menu can prevent respawn while up
loadout menu cooldown time#cooldown time after loadout menu is dismissed before player spawns in
loadout menu initial choice time#time before players initially spawn in for choosing starting loadout
maximum spawn suppression time#maximal time that a player can continue to delay his spawn by switching targets

_field_long_enum.name: ready#safe and ready to spawn - this value currently ignored
waiting#safe but waiting to spawn - this value currently ignored
enemy territory#spawn target is inside enemy territory volumes
teammate damaged#spawn target has recently taken damage
enemy nearby#There is an enemy within the cylinder around the spawn target
projectiles#There are dangerous projectiles in the area

_field_real.name: failover to influence spawning time#number of seconds before influence spawning will be used (<= 0 is disabled)
